title: LoL Advent 2014 - Day 14 - Christmas Pudding Rammus

embed.description: League of Legends Christmas Advent Calendar 2014! Every day until the big day I will release a League of Legends Christmas themed drawing, culminating in a free gift for everyone Christmas Day! Day...

body:
The League of Legends advent calendar has returned for it's third consecutive year!

Every day until the big day I will release a League of Legends Christmas themed drawing, culminating in a free gift for everyone Christmas Day!

Day 1 - [Christmas Tree Caitlyn](http://amber-enigma.deviantart.com/art/LoL-Advent-2014-Day-1-Caitlyn-497707541)
Day 2 - [Christmas Braum](http://amber-enigma.deviantart.com/art/Braum2014-497891828)
Day 3 - [Christmas Party Katarina](http://amber-enigma.deviantart.com/art/LoL-Advent-2014-Day-3-Katarina-498071372)
Day 4 - [Festive Skarner](http://amber-enigma.deviantart.com/art/LoL-Advent-2014-Day-4-Skarner-498210624)
Day 5 - [Christmas Chef Quinn](http://amber-enigma.deviantart.com/art/LoL-Advent-2014-Day-5-Quinn-and-Valor-498393108)
Day 6 - [Festive Lucian](http://amber-enigma.deviantart.com/art/LoL-Advent-2014-Day-6-Lucian-498567041)
Day 7 - [Starlight Irelia](http://amber-enigma.deviantart.com/art/LoL-Advent-2014-Day-7-Irelia-498803172)
Day 8 - [Winter Yasuo](http://amber-enigma.deviantart.com/art/LoL-Advent-2014-Day-8-Yasuo-498999845)
Day 9 - [Snow Shoveller Nidalee](http://amber-enigma.deviantart.com/art/LoL-Advent-2014-Day-9-Nidalee-499342220)
Day 10 - [Santa's Little "Helper" Veigar](http://amber-enigma.deviantart.com/art/LoL-Advent-2014-Day-10-Veigar-499557911?ga_submit_new=10%253A1418274548)
Day 11 - [Nutcracker Vi](http://amber-enigma.deviantart.com/art/LoL-Advent-2014-Day-11-Vi-499559221)
Day 12 - [Christmas Caroler Karthus](http://amber-enigma.deviantart.com/art/LoL-Advent-2014-Day-12-Karthus-499887893)
Day 13 - [Gift Wrapper Sivir](http://amber-enigma.deviantart.com/art/LoL-Advent-2014-Day-13-Sivir-500135807)
Day 14 - [Christmas Pudding Rammus](http://amber-enigma.deviantart.com/art/LoL-Advent-2014-Day-14-Rammus-500293674)

Gallery - http://amber-enigma.deviantart.com/gallery/52168911/League-of-Legends-Advent-2014

replies.body:
Concept of Nidalee throwing shovels at people, made me laugh. :D
Great concepts.
